title: Spicy Peanut Thai Stir Fry
steps: Heat the oil in a large wok over medium heat.
Add the garlic and onions, and saut√© for about 2 minutes.
Add the broccoli, and continue about 8 minutes more, until onions are translucent.
Add the red peppers and peanuts, and continue about 5 minutes more.
Mix together the sauce parts: sweet Thai chili sauce, peanut butter, and soy sauce. Pour over wok and mix.
